column4: yes.. you probably know about Gimp.. but do you know about GimpShop?  they rearrange teh menus to be more Photoshop friendly
I've never heard of gimpShop.......that sopunds cool!  Are any of the tools updated for better action? i.e. - the dodge & burn tools in Gimp that are very bad compared to actual Photoshop's...
I will definitley be checking that out
